name: Be Proactive
core_intent: Take responsibility for choices and focus effort on what you can influence.
operationalization: Use proactive language; act on controllables rather than blaming circumstances.

name: Begin with the End in Mind
core_intent: Define the desired outcome and values before acting.
operationalization: Write/maintain a personal mission or clear goal; plan backward from the target.

name: Put First Things First
core_intent: Prioritize what matters most (important over merely urgent).
operationalization: Schedule high-impact work first; protect time for important, non-urgent activities.

name: Think Win-Win
core_intent: Seek mutually beneficial outcomes in relationships and decisions.
operationalization: Negotiate for shared value; avoid win-lose or lose-win defaults.

name: Seek First to Understand, Then to Be Understood
core_intent: Use empathic listening before advocating your position.
operationalization: Reflect and clarify othersâ€™ needs first; then communicate your view clearly.

name: Synergize
core_intent: Create better solutions through collaboration and valuing differences.
operationalization: Combine strengths across people; co-create options neither side would reach alone.

name: Sharpen the Saw
operationalization: Regularly invest in physical, mental, social/emotional, and spiritual renewal.
